6.12b: Increased  Metamorphosis attack range from 500 to 550.
6.60: Metamorphosis now increases movement speed by 20 on each level.
6.67: Removed from Captain's Mode. Reworked Soul Steal
6.00: Reduced  Conjure Image illusion outgoing damage from 35%/45%/55%/65% to 25%/35%/45%/55%. Reduced  Sunder cast range from 250/500/750 to 250 on each level.
6.04: Reduced Soul Steal link break distance from 800 to 600. Reduced  Metamorphosis attack range from 600 to 575.
6.53: Reduced movement speed from 320 to 300. Increased all spells' cast point from unknown to 0.5 (Metamorphosis is still instant).
6.30: Conjure Image Reduced cooldown from 17 to 16. Changed cast behaviour from target unit to no target. It could only target Terrorblade before anyway.
6.35: Increased base armor from 0 to 2 (total armor is now 5.08).  Metamorphosis no longer reduces armor by 1.  Sunder Reduced manacost from 250 on each level to 200/100/0. Reduced cooldown from 200/180/160 to 200/120/60.
6.73b: Fixed a bug on Zeal health regeneration.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.10: Reduced Terrorblade's collision size during  Metamorphosis from unknown to 24.
6.79: Increased  Metamorphosis duration from 40 on each level to 40/44/48/52.
6.78: Increased  Conjure Image illusion duration from 25 to 32. Reduced  Sunder minimum health exchange from 33%/28%/23% to 25%/20%/15%.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12. Increased  Metamorphosis illusion damage taken from 250% to 350%.
6.75: Increased base armor from 2 to 4 (total armor is now 7.08). Increased base health regeneration from 0.25 to 2. Reworked  Reflection
6.12: Reduced  strength gain from 2.4 to 1.9. Reduced  Metamorphosis attack range from 575 to 500.
6.76: Increased  Metamorphosis attack damage bonus from 15/30/45/60 to 20/40/60/80.
6.72: Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Increased movement speed from 300 to 310. Replaced Soul Steal with  Reflection
6.82c: Increased  Conjure Image illusion damage taken from 300% to 425%.  Metamorphosis now reduces movement speed by 25.  Sunder No longer stuns Terrorblade and the target for 0.01 seconds. Increased cast range from 250 to 325.
6.80: Increased  Reflection cast range from 250 to 275.  Sunder Is no longer partially blocked by spell immunity. Reduced cooldown from 160/110/60 to 120/80/40.
6.81: Reduced  gain from 1.9 to 1.4.  Reflection Can now be dispelled. Reduced duration from 5 to 2.5/3.5/4.5/5.5.
6.82: Enabled in Captain's Mode. Reduced  Sunder cast point from 0.5 to 0.35.
6.83: Reduced  Reflection cast point from 0.5 to 0.3. Rescaled  Sunder minimum health exchange from 25%/20%/15% to 20%.
6.84: Reflection Increased cast range from 275 to 325. Increased illusion outgoing damage from 40%/50%/60%/70% to 40%/60%/80%/100%.
6.20: Metamorphosis no longer uses a 2 second transformation time. Increased  Sunder manacos from 175 to 250.
6.28: Fixed base health being 100 instead of 150. Reduced base  strength from 17 to 15 (to keep his total health similar to before).
